content: all in one baby fish fry - amigurumi pattern by criss wall i have a huge collection of scrap balls of yarn i really wanted to use them instead of throwing them out so i started crocheting small toys to leave around for people to find they turned out to be so popular i just can t stop making them i know that there are a few lovely fish patterns out there already but some of them take quite a while to finish i wanted to create a small series of patterns that take less than 30 mins to complete and do not involve sewing additional parts onto the work this pattern is my all in one fish fry baby fish pattern i have a larger fish pattern available also stitches  chain chain  single_crochet single_crochet  half_double_crochet half_double_crochet  increase increase  decrease decrease materials / notes  8mm or 10mm safety eyes but you can embroider eyes on if you like  two different coloured yarns if possible  needle crochet hook scissors etc  please use the hook size you are most comfortable using but as a guide - for 8ply/dk yarn i usually use a 3 5mm hook for 10ply/aran i use a 4 0mm  this pattern takes under 20 mins and when i use 8ply/dk and a 3 5mm hook each fish uses about 12 metres of yarn - 7 metres plain and 5 metres variegate  they measure about 8cm long and 4cm high criss wall https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/all-in-one-baby-fish-fry baby fish fry instructions body for my example piece in the pictures i have used two colours for my fish you can easily use one colour if you choose the pattern listed below has the fishes colour changes in the same place as my photos row 1 using the main / plain colour single_crochet 5 into a magic_ring 5 stitches one thing i like doing with the pattern is not pulling the magic_ring super tight if you leave a hole in the middle it looks just like a fish s mouth row 2 *increase in each single_crochet* repeat around 10 stitches row 3 single_crochet 10 10 stitches row 4 *increase in next single_crochet single_crochet 1* repeat around 15 stitches row 5 single_crochet 15 15 stitches row 6 change colour to alternative colour single_crochet 15 15 stitches row 7 single_crochet 2 increase in next stitch complete fin by crocheting all the stitches in brackets into the front loop of the next stitch slip_stitch into the front loop of the next stitch chain 2 4 half_double_crochet chain 2 slip_stitch back into the front loop of the same stitch increase in next stitch single_crochet 5 increase in next stitch complete fin slip_stitch into the front loop of the next stitch chain 2 4 half_double_crochet chain 2 slip_stitch back into the same stitch increase in next stitch single_crochet 2 19 stitches summary single_crochet 2 increase fin increase single_crochet 5 increase fin increase single_crochet 2 = 19
